about.details:
Incorporated in 1992, Creative Peripherals and Distribution Ltd distributes consumer electronics to retailers and resellers in India. The company distributes IT, imaging, lifestyle, and telecom products.

They are engaged in providing distribution services of both volume business and value business products. It has partnered with a number of renowned brands for distribution in the country such as Rapoo Technologies Ltd, Lino Manfrotto + Co S.p.a, Transcend Information Inc, ViewSonic International Corporation, Olympus Corporation, Belkin Inc, Zioncom (Hong Kong) Technology Ltd, Apple India Private Ltd, Sennheiser Electronics India Private Ltd, Gopro Cooperatief U.A, TPV Technology India Private Ltd, Printronix, SIEPL India Electronics Private Ltd, Vintron Infronatics Ltd and Samsung India Electronics Private Ltd.

CPDL is a broad based distribution model which is based on multiple products and multiple brand strategy. The focus is to capture a considerable market share in each of the product categories that will help in its offerings to channel partners and also spread its market risks arising out of fluctuations in the market share of various brands besides helping it to achieve economies of scale.

faqs.question: What is the Creative Peripherals Distribution IPO?
faqs.answer:
Creative Peripherals Distribution IPO is a SME IPO of 1800000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹13.50 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹75 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on March 29, 2017, and closes on April 3, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Creative Peripherals Distribution IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Creative Peripherals Distribution IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Creative Peripherals Distribution IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Creative Peripherals Distribution IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Creative Peripherals Distribution IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: How to apply for Creative Peripherals Distribution IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Creative Peripherals Distribution IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
